text: Your military reach is too puny to protect the trade routes, closing your markets from the rest of the world.
The markets cannot flourish without expansion.
Stake a thousand taels of gold on one throw.
Count every coin, and make every coin count.
Money is not everything, but without it you can do nothing.
[[b]]Mercantilism[[/b]] can be increased by assignments and trade agreements.
[[b]]Mercantilism[[/b]] can be decreased by assignments, armies, and governors.
Even in war, trade is the lifeblood of a nation.
• Reduce Income from all other sources
• Armies boost Trade Influence while consuming Mercantilism
• Governor boost Trade Income while consuming Mercantilism
Even in war, trade is the lifeblood of a nation.
Even in war, trade is the lifeblood of a nation.
Order an subordinate to invest for the future, spending now to earn more later.
Display your influence and magnanimity by personally assigning a trusted official to protect the trade routes.
We are offering a trade agreement with {#recipientsfaction#}
Negotiate a trade agreement with this faction, which will increase your trade roads. You will receive the funds displayed per turn, as well as any trade resources they have.
Negotiate a trade agreement between this faction and yours. You will receive the funds displayed per turn, as well as any trade resources they have.
We will exploit trade agreement with {#proposersfaction#}
